definition: in a damnable manner, expletives used informally as intensifiers, people who are condemned to eternal punishment
details:
adverb
- in a damnable manner
= synonyms: damnably, cursedly
adjective
- expletives used informally as intensifiers
= synonyms: damn
- in danger of the eternal punishment of Hell
= example: in danger of the eternal punishment of Hell
= synonyms: doomed, cursed, unredeemed, unsaved
noun
- people who are condemned to eternal punishment
= example: people who are condemned to eternal punishment
